timeline.bodyText: It's better to throw an exception here, if return -1 it means the currentPosition is lower than otherPosition

timeline.bodyText: I think we can use an empty ackset to simplify these lines.

timeline.bodyText: Looks there is much duplicate code with the individualAckNormal, is it possible to refine it?

timeline.bodyText: Move the isTransactionEnabled to the topic or subscription?  We cannot treat consumers differently in transaction.
